channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Europe’s most popular sign of Christmas is a star that’s been handmade for over 180 years by one of the world’s oldest Protestant denominations
item.description: You already know the Moravian Star, even if you don't know where it's from or why it looks so distinctively beautiful.

item.title: Carmelo Anthony reflects on Hall of Fame career, investing wins and passing on Google and crypto: ‘That’s another one I should have went with my gut on’
item.description: The NBA legend talked to Fortune about his business career, his investments, NIL rights and more: "Now, I don't think these kids really enjoy that mom...

item.title: Two Gen Zers turned down millions from Elon Musk to build an AI based on the human brain—and it’s outperformed models from OpenAI and Anthropic
item.description: William Chen and Guan Wang believe they will be the first ones to build artificial general intelligence.

item.title: Futures and Treasuries markets on CME black out overnight, after a glitch at an all-important data centre
item.description: "BrokerTec EU markets are open and trading. All other CME Group markets remain halted due to a data center cooling issue at CyrusOne," CME told Fortun...

item.title: I went to COP30—and saw how the rest of the world is pushing climate action even as the U.S. steps back
item.description: Amid the diplomatic gridlock, perhaps the real story of COP30 was happening outside the negotiation halls.

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ has made at least $1B for Netflix already. Could it make $2B?
